movies.title: Eternity and a Day
movies.plot: Alexander, an old writer, is ill and prepared to die. He says his goodbyes and recalls his life with his wife long ago. While driving his car he saves a street kid, an illegal immigrant from Albania, from being arrested. Later in the day, by chance, he sees the same boy being abducted, and follows in his car. Although he is preoccupied with his own regrets, he puts death on hold to find a way to help the boy.
movies.simplePlot: Famous writer Alexander is very ill and has little time left to live. He meets a little boy on the street, who is an illegal immigrant from Albania, and goes on a journey with him to take the boy home.

biography.bio: Bruno Ganz debuted at the theatre in 1961 and gained there a good reputation as a solid, young actor. In 1970 he founded with Peter Stein the theatre company "Schaubuehne" of Berlin. His debut at the movies was early and unsuccessful during the decade of 1960. His talent as a reflexive actor with tendencies towards introspection was widely known after Summer Guests (1976).
biography.name: Bruno Ganz

biography.bio: Isabelle Renauld was born on November 24, 1966 in Saint-Malo, Ille-et-Vilaine, France. She is an actress, known for Eternity and a Day (1998), Je vais bien, ne t'en fais pas (2006) and Monsieur Ibrahim (2003).
biography.name: Isabelle Renauld

biography.bio: Fabrizio Bentivoglio was born on January 4, 1957 in Milan, Lombardy, Italy. He is an actor and writer, known for Les opportunistes (2013), Remember Me, My Love (2003) and Eternity and a Day (1998). He has been married to Silvia Pippia since May 19, 2012. They have two children.
biography.name: Fabrizio Bentivoglio

biography.bio: Achileas Skevis is known for his work on Eternity and a Day (1998), Iatriko aporrito (2008) and Eho ena mystiko... (2008).
biography.name: Achileas Skevis

biography.bio: Lazaros Andreou is an actor, known for The Golden Apples of the Hesperides (1997), Love Under the Date-Tree (1990) and Honeymoon (1979).
biography.name: Lazaros Andreou

biography.bio: Aristotelis Aposkitis is an actor, known for Eternity and a Day (1998), Meteor and Shadow (1985) and Akrovatontas (2003).

biography.bio: Despina Bebedelli was born in 1941 in Athens, Greece. She is an actress, known for Le pré obscur (2009), Her Violet Garden (1997) and Peri anemon kai ydaton (2000).
biography.name: Despina Bebedelli

biography.bio: Iris Chatziantoniou is an actress, known for To athoo soma (1997), Me demena matia (1996) and Eternity and a Day (1998).
biography.name: Iris Chatziantoniou

biography.bio: Dimitris Fotsinos-Safrantzas is an actor, known for Eternity and a Day (1998).
biography.name: Dimitris Fotsinos-Safrantzas

biography.bio: Petros Fyssoun was born in October 5, 1933 in Agrinio, Greece. Some sources claim that he was born in Russia. He was a child of a Russian refugee father, that settled in Greece after the October Revolution. He studied acting at the Drama School of "Theatro Technis" and made his stage debut in a 1953 Athens production of Thornton Wilder's "Our Town". He soon became one of the top actors of his generation and had an extremely rich theatrical career: Sophocles' "Electra" (as Orestis), Lillian Hellmann's "Watch on the Rhine" (as Kurt Muller), Anton Chekhov's "The Seagull" (as Dorn), Eugene O' Neill's "Desire Under the Elms" (as Ephriam Cabot) etc. He collaborated with the National Theater of Greece and often created personal stage groups. Equally interesting was his film career: he made his screen debut in 1958 and starred in many important dramas, like Les hors-la-loi (1958) and Treason (1964). The past few weeks before his death, he was hospitalized in the hospital "Sotiria" of Athens, with Respiratoty Infection. He passed away on December 5, 2016
biography.name: Petros Fyssoun

biography.bio: Eleni Gerasimidou is a Greek actress and a politician. Born in Thessaloniki(Greece) in 1949. She is married to Antoni Kseno. She have played theater, ancient tragedies, cinema and television. she wanted to become journalist but her mother told her to become actress. Her sister was also an actress Natasha Gerasimidou.she joined K.K.E. in 2012 elections and elected in Thessaloniki
biography.name: Eleni Gerasimidou

biography.name: Rony Gianari

biography.bio: Milena Giannakidou is an actress, known for Eternity and a Day (1998).
biography.name: Milena Giannakidou

biography.bio: Mihalis Giannatos was born in 1941 in Constantinople, Turkey. He was an actor, known for Midnight Express (1978), Captain Corelli's Mandolin (2001) and Munich (2005). He was married to Chaido. He died on September 17, 2013 in Athens, Greece.
biography.name: Mihalis Giannatos

biography.bio: Themis Gousoulis is an actor, known for Eternity and a Day (1998).
biography.name: Themis Gousoulis
